start.text: We've got inbound. Greenlight to engage.
Soften up the enemy, but try to keep the good stuff intact.
Things are getting busy. You're free to engage any enemy signatures starting now.
We've got alarms raising in ships and on carriers. We're on the clock, so make it snappy.
Alright, ramblers, let's get rambling. Anything and everything is free for the taking.
Shoot down the enemy. Let them know we have control.
Proceed to what area you think you can take on first and engage!

start_boss.text: IFF confirmed! Significant enemy contacts identified! This is it!
Radar tags all across the board! Incoming!
We've got some really, really intense energy readings coming up.
Total destruction of the enemy's combat forces are our prime objective for this operation.

retreat.text: Seems like the tactical retreat is in full swing.
Tighten up comms. Let's keep it business from here on out.
Come on, I'd rather not inherit a graveyard.

engaged.text: Rack them up and knock 'em down.
We're taking the bait. We just gotta thread this needle as best we can.
Accept nothing less than total superiority.

need_help.text: Check your radios! I can't raise anyone on the horn!
Hello?! Hello?! Is anyone out there?!

pursuing.text: That should give everyone else some wiggle room.
Oh, lookie here! That jamming is just plummeting! Keep hitting 'em!
Shut up, keep fighting. We still got bogeys.
If they want to get uppity, be my guest.

running.text: We're mercenaries, not heartless. Break off.
Pull out while we've got a chance!

hull_90.text: Tire them out! They're only human!

hull_50.text: We don't take these things out, we're gonna be up to our necks in shit!
Aw, come on, what the hell?

hull_30.text: Hey, pilot, get us out of the AO, now!
Our sensors just blew out! Everyone brace!
No running from this one, huh.

victory.text: Spot on support, you lucky bastards. Resistance is no factor.
If we keep racking up kills like that, we're gonna need a bigger offshore account.
It's harder to create than it is to destroy.
All threats eliminated and scopes are clear! Good stuff!
Alright, salvage what you need to get out of here! We can celebrate when we're back in port!

victory_boss.text: Hey, pop that champagne bottle I got in the fire extinguisher box! I don't give a damn if we get the consoles wet! We're rich after this mission! Rich!
After this mission, don't tell me I never do anything for you.
